name: ROBUST ROAD ROLLER
description: Take control of a Road Roller and flatten everything in the demolition game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, 7 SP1, 8, 8.1, 10 - 32bit or 64bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 3.16GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
